stsjorbsmod:AlchemistsFireRelic.NAME: Alchemist's Fire
stsjorbsmod:AlchemistsFireRelic.FLAVOR: Forca Messi! Forca Messi! Messi Animal!
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduces stsjorbsmod:Burning falloff rate to 10% per turn.

stsjorbsmod:BookOfTrialsRelic.NAME: Book of Trials
stsjorbsmod:BookOfTrialsRelic.FLAVOR: Like tongues, but not at all.
DESCRIPTIONS: Add #b2 cards from the stsjorbsmod:Deck of Trials to your deck at the start of each act.

stsjorbsmod:BottledMemoryRelic.NAME: Bottled Memory
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose a card that #yRemembers. Start each combat with this card in your hand.

stsjorbsmod:GrimoireRelic.NAME: Grimoire
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, remember stsjorbsmod:Patience. NL At the end of each combat, heal #b1 HP per stsjorbsmod:Clarity.

stsjorbsmod:MindGlassRelic.NAME: Mind Glass
DESCRIPTIONS: Gaining stsjorbsmod:Clarity deals 3 damage to all enemies. NL Gaining 10 stsjorbsmod:Clarity in the same fight deals 100 damage to all enemies.

stsjorbsmod:MindPalaceRelic.NAME: Mind Palace
stsjorbsmod:MindPalaceRelic.FLAVOR: Is this a fortress or a prison?
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with stsjorbsmod:Clarity of the memory you ended the last combat remembering, if any.
